user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I love highlighters. I own both high end to drug store. However, there is something special about Tom Ford products. They apply beautifully and the packaging is sooo LUX!! Makes the entire makeup process a wonderful experience. I am medium skin toned and although both colors look wonderful on my skin, I usually swirl both colors together. Love this product.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This highlighter is worth the money and looks beautiful on deep and dark skin tones!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Auburn', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: First the compact is difficult to open. Second the product ages my eyes so badly it’s embarrassing. Third fir this price point I expect perfection and no it’s not even adequate. Summation: do NOT buy if you have any crepey skin or deep set eyes.

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: This is hands down the most intense, wet looking highlighter tom ford has ever released. I should know, because I buy them all. Unfortunately, this is too dark for my NC20 skin. I make it work by using a fluffier brush for a lighter application. If you want a wet looking highlighter, this is the BEST on the market. TOM FORD, if you're listening, PLEASE MAKE THIS IN MORE SHADES PLEEEEEEASE

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: this highlighter is PERFECT for photographs. It photographs so beautifully with the most gorgeous glow on your skin. It looks unreal while also looking natural at the same time. I used to use Becca and Charlotte Tilbury highlights and this Tom Ford one beats them all. Also these colors are so so pretty as eyeshadows and you can layer them which each other too. I just love this highlight.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Tom Ford always has amazing sleek packaging which I love. I swatched this in store and knew I had to add it to my overgrowing highlighter collection. It isn't glittery and blends effortlessly into the skin for a nice healthy dewy glow.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Red', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: So pretty! I had a lapse in judgment and spent this much on a highlight. So worth it! It becomes one with the skin immediately. Such a beautiful sheen! The pink is gorgeous, but I can only use it when I’m tan. Setting spray leaves it looking seamless. I can’t say enough good things.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This product is amazing. It gives such a beautiful glow and blends so easily. I used it on my checks, nose, and eyes and it looked beautiful everywhere. I just love the formula so much. TF is so expensive and id been debating this product purchase for so long but it was so worth it. Only this preventing 5 stars is the price. $80 is A LOT. not sure it’s worth $80.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Absolutely in love with this product! Beautiful packaging and a beautiful soft product. It goes on soft and smooth and is buildable and gives an amazing shimmery glow. Gorgeous!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: The most BEAUTIFUL highlighter I’ve ever use! I simply cannot live without this. I combine both colors together and it is stunning!! I plan on ordering 2 backups!! Worth the splurge!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: This is amazing! I bought this blush/highlight for my wedding. I just swiped my brush across the whole thing - it was an unbelievably gorgeous shade. I even sold my make up artist on it! Highly recommend.

Tom Ford highlighters are always good quality, but it's nice to see them branch out into shades that look good on a darker skintone. Both the gold and rose gold shades look luminous and natural without any glitter or obvious streaks.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Didn't fill a void in my collection
review_content:
I love to indulge in luxury makeup and Tom Ford has some of the best! This duo kept catching my eye and I finally purchased it. During the summer time, this was a great multi-purpose product for me; I used it on the cheeks and on my eyes. Not to mention, bronze warm tones are my go-to! I think this is too expensive for what it is (though you are also paying top $ for the brand name). If you can, I recommend swatching this product in person and deciding for yourself. Now that it is becoming colder, I reach for this a lot less. I don't think it is worth buying exclusively as a highlighter as there are so many great ones on the market that aren't as expensive and are just as beautiful. I have fair skin, but could see this being a staple product for those with deeper skin tones.

This is my favourite highlighter.. Gives the perfect glow and great for highlighting the inner corner of ur eyes and brow area.. Pricey but we worth it and will last you a while even if you use it everyday

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_title: Best highlighter on the market. Get it!
review_content: This is my first TF makeup purchase, although I've been a fan and owner of TF fragrances for years. Yes, the price is steep. However, the highlighters give the most beautiful, subtle glow that I've ever seen. Other highlighters I own are Becca and Algenist and Cover FX. All of these are amazing, yet TF still beats them. Now that I've sample this product, I want to try out other TF items.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Type Oily', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Eye Color Green']
review_content:
This highlight duo is spectacular. Be warned- this duo is NOT for fair skin unless you want to use it more as an all over bronze or blush topper. I have medium-lightish skin and it's nearly too dark for me. Either way, I prefer highlight that is blended around the whole cheek area, so this is absolute perfection. It's sooo glossy and I don't agree with the name that it's sheer. I sweep from the apple of my cheek up to my eye and voila, perfection. I took off 1 star because while the packaging is pretty and sleek, it does have a plastic cheap feel. For the price, this should be a bit more luxurious. PS- This has NO glitter, praise Jesus.

review_title: I'm in love with TF beauty!!
review_content:
I am OBSESSED with this highlighter duo it's stunning! I bought this during the VIBRouge sale and haven't been able to stop using it since! I thought I was going to love the gold highlight more because gold highlighters look better on my brown caramel skin but I love the rose gold shade more, but it doesn't matter because I always mix them together anyway. This highlighter is like nothing I've seen it just glows and really becomes your skin so it just looks natural! This is the first highlighter that is so pretty on I had a hard time stopping myself from constantly applying lol. It doesn't emphasize my texture like other highlighters! It's magic, I am convinced!

I have never loved a highlighter so much in my life!!!! I prefer this over the becca highlighters. The becca highlights are just as great. But this TF highlight is even better!!! It gives you a wet look and melts instantly into the skin. The becca highlights are finely milled, but not as finely milled as this TF highlight. It's soooo beautifulllll!!!!!!!

This highlighter duo says "sheer", there is no sheerness to this!! This is fully pigmented, its beautiful its classy, its bright, not too much glitter at all. If you have the extra money i think its defiantly worth it. I gave it a 4 star because of the fact that for the pan size i think its on the smaller side. I think for the price point of $78 dollars it defiantly could be bigger. But in reality also, your paying for the name and the product and the product itself is really amazing.

review_title: Five for the bottom shade though!
review_content:
I can't review the more gold highlight bc it was unfortunately too dark for my skin (I glow in the dark kinda pale). The bottom, cooler toned shade was beautiful, great formula, and didn't emphasize the milia on my cheekbones. However, if I'm going to buy this expensive of a highlighter, everything has to be perfect for me. The packaging wasn't there and I couldn't use the golden shade unless it was an eyeshadow, so this one was returned. Unfortunately. Because I really did like the bottom shade.

I'm so glad someone else mentioned the packaging. If this were to be judged on packaging alone, I'd dock all but 2 stars. Yes, there is a bag for the compact not unlike Dior. However, there is nothing substantial to the packaging. It feels cheap and plasticky. The magnetic closure is fine, but I prefer something that locks like the Marc Jacobs closure. Now, onto the product. Absolutely stunning and beautiful! The shades look more intense in the pan and even so when swatched with your fingers. I am an NC20 and both shades are beautiful. The top is definitely gold and I use the other highlighter for evenings out or as a blush topper. This is my first Tom Ford purchase and aside from the packaging, I'm glad I purchased this.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: Love TF highlighters in general and this is no exception. It leaves a beautiful finish and its not too chunky or glittery.

user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Green']
review_content:
First, I think I need to talk about the packaging. Yes-- totally beautiful with the white and gold. However, once I got my hands on it, it feels super light weight and the gold portion is so cheap looking (plastic). Pretty disappointed in that aspect considering the price point. It does have a magnetic closure though, so that part is nice. The highlighters are gorgeous! The colors are darker in person than what it shows on screen, but they still do their job well. I am currently between light and medium skin tone and both colors work well for me. It's finely milled, but I do catch bits of glitter when I look in the mirror. Not chunky by any means, but they reflect for sure. Overall, I'm very happy with the actual product. I could do without the baggie and have the packaging reflect more on the luxe spectrum considering the brand. 4 stars considering the actual product inside is so pretty.

These two shades are perfect for fair skin. Lasts all day (I work in a hot restaurant) especially with a setting spray. Soft powder, it's not glittery.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Fair']
review_content:
Being a fair skinned girl (NC-20), I wasnt sure if this was going to work for me. I tried on the top pan and yes, it definitely leans towards the golden spectrum(usually golden highlights show up as a dark stripe on my skin), but I wore it out today and it didnt feel misplaced at all. The reflects in this is gorgeous, and I definitely did admire its shine throughout the day. I think this swatches lighter on skin than it looks in pan. The bottom pan is definitely darker than my normal skin, but would be wearable where I have applied blush, or in the summertime when I get darker. One thing I did not expect is the blinding finish of this product. I wouldnt say its glittery, but its definitely not a subtle highlight. I usually find Tom Ford glitter products very subtle, sophisticated and hard to apply(the holiday eye and cheek palette was very disappointing for me), but this is a completely different product, and Im pleasantly surprised. I hope when Tom Ford releases their next holiday eye and cheek palette, they make it with this formula. One tip: products with the cross hatch imprint on the makeup is a gel-based formula. I will be looking out for more products of his with the cross hatch as I have been having success with them.
…read more

This highlight is everything!!!! I honestly had low expectations because it's Tom Ford and a lot of his products aren't that pigmented to me (minus the lip products). I contemplated returning this before it was delivered to my door step. Just bought it for the hype. I thought this would be another product where you're just paying for the fancy packaging and the name. The swatches on my hand were very blah, but when I applied it to the high points of my face with a basic highlighter brush, it was STUNNING!!! I'm blown away. This is more gorgeous than the becca highlighters and the anastasia ones. If you are looking for a subtle glow, I wouldn't buy this. The title says "sheer" but it's definitely that beam you can see from mars. Def would look even more beautiful on deeper skin. I can't see this working on very fair skin girls. Both colors are super golden.

beautiful colors but just boxed this up and shipped it back. pigment just flaked away leaving only glitter glitter glitter. So expensive; quality gets a C

The pigmentation, the finish, and the quality are all beautiful. Not a single complaint to be found in those regards. Unfortunately, as someone just a shade or two darker than Casper (NC-15), it was too dark for me- enough that it would look too obvious on me than I'd prefer. With a heavy heart, it's been returned. :(

TF this is a total winner!!!! Yes it is expensive, but the creamy quality of this powder is out of this world amazing! The highlighting duo is five stars and the packaging is five stars! Absolutely thrilled with this purchase and I recommend to all TF beauty fans!
